translation.en: [newscaster] You're watching Channel 38, Austin. Building a better Texas.

translation.en: People in the Southwest are looking for relief from a deadly heat wave.
translation.ko: “실화를 바탕으로 함” 시민들은 살인적인 더위로부터 피할 곳을 찾고 있습니다

translation.en: A few areas, like Fort Worth, Texas, and parts of Oklahoma, saw rain Monday

translation.en: for the first time in a long time.
But for most, the month-long drought continues.

translation.en: -NBC's Cummins reports. -[dog barking]
[Robin on recording] You've reached the Murray O'Hairs.
-Leave a message. -[answering machine beeps]

Everyone's here.
Hey, y'all. Gonna be a scorcher today.

[Robin] Grandma?

Did you get a good look at anybody? Recognize anyone?

[Robin] Shh. I think someone's coming.
Check their restraints.

[Madalyn] You're tellin' me to shut up?
I don't think you know whose weeds you're pissing in, buddy.

translation.en: -I said shut up. -[Madalyn] I heard you.
I chose to ignore you.
Who are you working for, huh?
Did Jerry Falwell put you up to this, huh? The Baptists, that it?

translation.en: -[Garth whispers] Mother, please. -I think we're good.
translation.ko: - 엄마, 제발 - 이제 된 것 같네

translation.en: All right, let's go.
[Madalyn] Cocksuckers, you're not gonna get away with this!
[shouting] Don't you know who I am?
[softly] God damn it.
-[dogs barking] -[indistinct radio chatter]
So, Mr. Collier, you say the cars are gone now.
Shouldn't they just be in them?
[Roy] The door was open, breakfast on the table,

translation.en: -and they'd never leave without the dogs. -[man] Mmm-hmm.

translation.en: And you say that this lady lives here with her son and his daughter?

translation.en: Yes. Uh, no. The granddaughter's from her other son.

translation.en: It's an interesting living arrangement.
Wait a minute.
Madalyn Murray O'Hair. That's who we're talking about here?

translation.en: Are you sure that this isn't just another one of her publicity stunts?

translation.en: [smacks lips] Mr. Collier, this is Texas.
Not against the law to go missing here.
[Madalyn] Garth, I loosened it. I loosened it.
Come here. Give me your hands. Give me your hands.
-[Garth] What are you-- -Give me your hands.
Just get it untied. That's...
[Garth] I... I can't. [Madalyn] You can do it.
translation.ko: - 난 못 해요 - 할 수 있어

translation.en: -[Garth] Oh, my God. It's really... -That's it. That's it.
[Garth] What kind of knot is that?
[Madalyn] Come on. You can do it.
[Garth] Well, get closer to me, then.
-[Madalyn] Oh, all right. -[Garth grunts]
[Garth] Jesus! [Madalyn] Come on.
[Garth] Oh. Almost. I almost got--
[Madalyn] Come on. [Garth pants] No, I... No, it's not...
-It's useless. It's not gonna happen. -Jesus, Mary and Joseph!
I knew I should have sent you to fucking Boy Scouts.
[Garth] I don't know what you think you're gonna do anyway. They both have guns.
[Madalyn sighs] If we could get these hoods off,
we might have a better idea of what we're dealing with.
-Come on. Try again. -[Garth] No.
-[Madalyn] Come on, Garthy-- -No, stop it.
[Madalyn] Don't you disobey your mother!
[Garth] Or what, you're gonna take me over your knee?
[Madalyn] Yes, I just might-- [Robin] Stop it, both of you!
[Madalyn softly] God damn it, I have to pee.
Hey, people!
If you don't let me out of here, I'm gonna piss all over your floor!
translation.ko: 날 지금 안 내보내 주면 바닥이 오줌 바다가 될걸

translation.en: [sighs] Lady, you're gonna need to calm down.
[Madalyn] Calm down? You want me to calm down, shit for brains?
translation.ko: 나보고 진정하라고? 그게 할 말이야, 멍청아?

translation.en: In case you hadn't noticed, we've got bags over our heads,

You do what we say and everyone gets out of here safe and sound.
translation.ko: 시키는 대로 하면 모두 무사히 나갈 거야

translation.en: [Madalyn] Oh, now that sounds like the big man in charge.
Is that the big man in charge?
Get this goddamn thing off of my head and show me who you are.
translation.ko: 망할 봉지 좀 벗겨봐 당신 얼굴 좀 보게

translation.en: You think you got the balls to take me on?
[softly] Jesus Christ.
[Madalyn] What? What's going on?
-Garth, what's going on? -[Garth sighs]
-Oh, my God. -Robin.
[Madalyn] Oh, my God, is that who I think it is?
Fuck.
Hello, Madalyn.
-[Bill] This is Bill Murray. -Bill, it's Roy. Roy Collier.
What do you want?
It's your mom... and Robin and Garth.
They've disappeared.
I just saw them in Dallas.
I'm not kidding.
The police said that in order for somebody to officially be considered missing,

translation.en: they need somebody in the family to file a report.
Why would I do that?
Besides, they're probably off on some crazy trip again.
translation.ko: 게다가, 그 사람들은 또 광란의 여행 중일 거야

translation.en: -No, this is different, Bill. -Roy...
you know they're not in my life anymore.
And, frankly, I'd like to keep it that way.
translation.ko: 솔직히 그 상태로 안 돌아오면 좋겠어

translation.en: Okay?
Bill--
Ferguson...
I need those 600 words on the Alamo anniversary by 5:00.
Relax, man. It's the same story I wrote last year and the year before that.
translation.ko: 걱정 마요, 어차피 작년이나 재작년이랑 내용은 같을 테니

translation.en: Well, can't help it if nothing ever happens in San Antonio.
translation.ko: 샌안토니오에 별일이 없으니 어쩔 수 없잖아

translation.en: No, plenty happens in San Antonio. I just don't get to write about it.

translation.en: -Where you going? -[phone ringing]
[sighs] Shit.
-Jack Ferguson. -[Roy] This is the reporter?
On a good day.
You know Madalyn Murray O'Hair? She's disappeared.
translation.ko: 매덜린 머레이 오헤어 아세요? 그녀가 사라졌어요

translation.en: Madalyn Murray O'Hair?
The damn cops won't do anything.
translation.ko: 빌어먹을 경찰은 아무 일도 안 할 거예요

translation.en: Only thing I could think to do was call a reporter.

translation.en: -Who's this? -Name's Roy. But I gotta go.
If you wanna know more, come by 1682 Greystone Drive tonight.
-What-- -I'll be there.
-[dial tone] -Hello?
[Pup] Madalyn?
Bless this food to our use...
and us to thy service.
-Amen. -[Mrs. Murray] Amen.
Now, I don't suppose you found a job today?
[Madalyn] I had an interview.
But I didn't get a law degree to be a damn receptionist.

translation.en: [chuckles] You'd be lucky to be someone's receptionist.

translation.en: If I were you, I'd start praying.
How do you put up with him, Mother?
translation.ko: 엄마는 아빠를 어떻게 참고 사시는 거예요?

translation.en: The question is, how do I tolerate you?
translation.ko: 내가 널 참는 건 생각 안 해?

translation.en: Living here for free.
-Bringing a bastard into my house. -Pup!
Don't you ever call my son that.

translation.en: Sweetie, why don't you just take your dinner and go on to our room? Hmm?

What else is new?
No, this is important.
Got an announcement.
Getting another grandchild.
That's right. Your precious daughter's got herself knocked up again.
-Oh, honey, no. -Yeah.
And the guy's kicked me to the curb again, saying it's not his,
translation.ko: 그 남자가 자기 애가 아니라며 저를 또 차버렸어요

You're an embarrassment.
That's right. That's right.
Walk away.
Just like they did.
I'm sorry, Mother.
-You wanna tell me what happened? -I don't know. Condom broke?
translation.ko: - 어떻게 된 건지 말해봐 - 모르겠어요 콘돔이 찢어졌나 보죠

translation.en: You sure you wanna keep it?
I mean, I can take care of Pup, and you know how he loves little Bill,

translation.en: and hopefully he'll come around.
translation.ko: 네 아빠에겐 내가 잘 말할게 아빠가 빌은 좋아하잖니 네 아빠도 마음이 바뀔 거야

translation.en: He's right.
I got a law degree and no job, and a kid and no husband.

translation.en: Maddy, you made a couple of mistakes, that's all.

translation.en: with their identical lives, and...

translation.en: They disgust me, but sometimes I...

translation.en: Well, I could be a secretary.
Telephone operator.
You could sell Avon like Ms. Wright.

translation.en: We're just too damn smart for these hicks.

I'll bet they're going to the White Tower restaurant.

Well, Billy Boy... [sighs]

-Noncon-- -Nonconformist?
-Yeah. -Well, you could say that, I guess.

Excuse me?
Well, you're always going on about what's wrong with people,

[newscaster] Close to 100 demonstrators stepped out to protest the whites-only policy

translation.ko: 인종 차별에 대해 반대하는 100여 명이 시위에 나섰죠

translation.en: The activists were met with some resistance

[woman] I think that, uh, as much as we regret it, integration is here,

translation.en: and I would like to be able to do as much as I can to prevent it coming.

translation.ko: 여긴 나치가 있는 독일이 아니라 미국이에요

That's my boy.
What were you thinking?

"Judge not, lest ye be judged."
translation.ko: ‘남을 판단하지 마라 그들도 널 판단할 것이다’

translation.en: What about the neighbors?

translation.ko: 참견 좋아하는 모즐리 여사를 뭐하러 신경 써요?

translation.en: You really are one selfish SOB.

-You know, I've got some cold cuts-- -Mother, it's all--
translation.ko: - 먹을 것 좀 가져오마 - 엄마, 이건...

translation.en: You have no right to lecture me about morality.
translation.ko: 넌 도덕성에 대해 나한테 설교할 권한이 없어

May the Lord have mercy on your soul, Madalyn.

translation.en: Ooh, the Lord. I'm quaking in my boots.
Where was the Lord when I got knocked up, huh?
translation.ko: 제가 임신했을 때 주님은 어디 계셨죠?

translation.en: Where is the Lord now?
[Madalyn] What, Mother?

a revolt against the sins...
[Madalyn] It's like I keep telling you, it's just case after case down there.
translation.ko: 내가 늘 했던 말이랑 같네요 첩첩산중이라니까요

translation.en: [Mrs. Murray] Such a shame.
And then I've got this Negro girl with a baby,

translation.ko: 흑인 소녀를 봤는데 데려다줄 곳도 없고

translation.en: -We have looked-- -[Bill] Mom.
Just a sec, Bill.
No idea why I went into social work.
translation.ko: 내가 왜 사회 복지 일을 하는지 모르겠어요

translation.en: I thought I could help people.
translation.ko: 사람들을 도울 수 있을 줄 알았는데

translation.en: But I can't. There's too much red tape--
-[Bill] Mom! -Jesus, Mary and Joseph.
I said, "Just a sec."
Now you be good for Grandma, right, Garth?
translation.ko: 할머니 말 잘 듣고 있으렴 알았지, 가스?

translation.en: [Billy Graham] You can find everything that you've been searching for in Christ.
translation.ko: 여러분은 그리스도 안에서 모든 걸 찾을 수 있습니다

translation.en: And I'd better not come home and find my son watching that claptrap with you.
translation.ko: 애가 저런 멍청한 방송이나 봐야 하니 집에 오기가 싫죠

I'm gonna get in trouble again.
Well, it's not my fault you missed the bus.
translation.ko: 네가 버스를 놓친 건 내 잘못이 아니야

translation.en: Okay. All right, I'll talk to the teacher if I have to, okay?
translation.ko: 좋아, 그래야 한다면 내가 선생님께 얘기할게

translation.ko: 하늘에 계신 우리 아버지 아버지의 이름이 거룩히...

translation.en: -We are not making a habit of this. -I know.
translation.ko: - 이게 버릇이 되면 안 돼 - 알았어요

translation.en: -You've gotta start getting up earlier. -I know. What the hell is that?
translation.ko: 더 일찍 일어났어야지 뭐 하는 거지?

-You gotta be kidding me. -They make us say it every day.
translation.ko: - 지금 장난해? - 매일 해야 하는 걸요

translation.en: -They make you read the Bible, too? -Uh-huh.
I told the teacher I don't believe in prayer and asked to be excused.

translation.en: And what did she say?
She said we all have to bow our heads and pray.
[all] ...and the power and the glory.
-Amen. -What the hell's going on in here?
Excuse me?
If I wanted my son to learn the Lord's Prayer,
I would've sent him to goddamn Catholic school.
-Mrs. Murray-- -Ms. Murray.
Ms. Murray...
this is our morning devotion.
Well, I would like my son excused from the morning devotion.
translation.ko: 제 아들은 아침 기도에서 빼주면 좋겠군요

translation.en: -You don't want him to-- -Mmm-mmm.
I've never heard of anything like this in my life.

translation.ko: 위스키 한 병과 얼음 그릇을 챙겨

translation.en: with a bottle of whiskey and a bucket of ice.
And then one night, I...
I had this sudden rush of sorrow.
Because I understood.
I understood the, uh... the hatred
translation.ko: 어머니가 느끼고 있던 증오와 자기 연민을

translation.en: and the... the self-pity that she was feeling.
Because that's what I was feeling.
But I come here, and I...
I see others, much worse situations than me, and...
translation.ko: 저보다 더 나쁜 상황에 처한 다른 사람들을 만나

translation.en: you overcome, and you accept them.
And that, uh...
That's what I'm gonna do.
[group] Our Father...
[Bill] ...who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.ko: 우리 아버지 그 이름이 거룩히 빛나시며

translation.en: [all] Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.

translation.en: Give us this day our daily bread, forgive us our trespasses,
translation.ko: 우리에게 일용할 양식을 주시고 우리에게 잘못한 이를

And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.

[group] Amen.

Frank, I need another day on the Riverwalk article.

-Frank, listen. -Jack--
Robin Murray's Porsche just turned up abandoned at the airport

translation.en: Follow it up.
-Are you serious? -Yeah.
Frank! I love you!
All right.
[man] Nope. I didn't buy it from him.

translation.en: -You sure? -Positive.

translation.en: All right. If I sent a sketch artist to your house, would you be willing to sit down with him?

translation.en: -Sure. [sighs] -Thanks, Mr. Sparrow.
I don't get it.

translation.en: Well, maybe this isn't the work of a religious nut.
What do you mean?
Well, Madalyn was stashing loads of cash, right?

Greed.
This is just like the old days.
You used to let me win.
You were the boss. I had to.
Does that mean I'm supposed to let you win now?
translation.ko: 그 말은 이젠 내가 져줘야 한단 뜻이야?

translation.en: You do have the gun.
And we all know what that means. Compensating for a very small cock.
translation.ko: 거시기가 작은 녀석들이 보상심리로 총을 갖고 다니지

translation.en: -Right, Red? -[both chuckle]
-That's what you always say, Grandma. -[Madalyn chuckles]
Oh, come on, Madalyn. You can do better than that.

translation.en: I don't waste my best lines on small-time crooks.
translation.ko: 삼류 사기꾼한테 좋은 말 해 줄 생각 없어

translation.en: You get a load of that, Red? David Waters is lecturing me.
translation.ko: 레드, 너도 들었어? 데이비드가 날 가르치려 들어

translation.en: Your own son would tell you the exact same thing.
translation.ko: 당신 아들도 당신에게 같은 말을 하고 싶을 거야

translation.en: And...
gin.
I led a life wasted without faith in the Lord.
translation.ko: 전 주님을 믿지 않고 인생을 낭비했었죠

translation.en: And I hope I can right some of the wrongs I caused.

translation.en: I see my mother as a sinner now.

translation.en: She demanded things of God, and when he refused her requests, well...

Now all she cares about is... getting wealthy by hating God.

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you love your mother?
[Bill] Oh, I love my mother. I forgive my mother.

translation.ko: 하지만 이 나라를 상대로 하셨던 일은 자랑스럽지 않아요

[Bill] I wish I could pray for her.
Turn it off.

translation.en: Sold out to the highest bidder, the goddamn church.
translation.ko: 우릴 배신하고 망할 교회 쪽으로 붙었군

translation.en: Mother.
I've been called every dirty name in the book.
translation.ko: 난 책에서는 늘 나쁜 사람으로 쓰였고

translation.en: None of it hurt, but this... This...
Garth, am I really that bad of a mother?
No.
Mother, I will always be here.
-We'll both always be here. -[Madalyn] Oh...
Mr. Waters.
[Madalyn] Thank you, Roy.
-Ms. O'Hair, it is a pleasure. -[laughs]
Oh, well, have a seat. [clears throat]
I saw you on Carson last week.
[chuckles] I love the way you shut Billy Graham up.

translation.en: Oh, thank you. It was a little easier than it looked.
Now you're just being modest.
That preacher's more full of shit than a Christmas turkey, that's for sure.
Oh, hell, he's more full of shit than a goddamn humpback whale!
So... you're here about the, uh, office management position?
translation.ko: 어쨌든, 사무실 경영 업무에 지원하러 오신 거죠?

translation.en: Right now, we're holding this place together

I have held together more with less.

translation.en: My son, Bill, he used to, uh, run the place.

Oh, now those goddamn zombie twelve-steppers got a hold of him and...

I do have a few of the usual vices.
Oh, good.

Here's to.

translation.en: [stammers] Just a few petty crimes... when I was younger.

Wait, these are all donations?

I know.

translation.en: Good luck.
Mmm, what's going on?

It won't be long now.
[chuckles] It's about time.

Garth...
you try anything... anything, Madalyn and Robin are dead.

Let's go.

-You be careful, Garth. -[Garth] Okay.

translation.en: -Here you go, Grandma. -Thank you, darlin'.
Well, it looks like you might have me here.

translation.en: 'Night.
[mutters] Wait a minute.
Gin.
You'll win next time.
-[scoffing] Yeah. -[chuckling] Sure, I'll win one of these days.
You've done a real good job here, David.

I want you to know I did some, uh... digging...

True you were picked up for hustling?

maybe not karma.
Retaliation.

Thank you for telling me the fucking truth.

translation.en: I'm giving you a promotion, David.

translation.en: in the official ledger book.
I say most of them because...
this is our unofficial ledger.
I'll keep your secrets, you keep mine.

translation.en: Where are the rest?
In the trunk.
Well, at least $400,000 of it is.
Four hundred? Gary, what the hell?
The fucking guy didn't have enough.
We get the rest next week.
Shit.
Shit.
Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit!

Oh, don't tell me it's another hiccup. [scoffs]

Oh, for... This is getting ridiculous.

All right, I got it. I got it. You're the big boss.

Mother!

translation.en: They've got nothing.

translation.en: Oh, fuck.

translation.en: It's complicated. [chuckles]
My mother turned my own daughter against me...
What did the cops say?

translation.en: Wish I could say I was surprised.
So I sent a sketch artist down to work with the guy who bought Garth's car.

translation.en: Should have something soon. I would love for you to take a look.

translation.en: You know... if somebody did something to them...

translation.en: Especially those she was closest to.
-[Christmas music playing] -[clears throat] Uh, excuse me, uh...

translation.en: I just want to say American Atheists has had a wonderful year, and...

translation.en: that would not be so without all of you.

translation.en: So, thank you, and a very happy winter solstice.
-Strike up the carols! [laughs] -[people cheering]
Mother loves Christmas. She really, really does.
Oh, and you in your sweater. So darling.
-Will you get me a refill, Garthy? -[Garth] Of course.
translation.ko: - 한 잔 더 갖다 줄래? - 물론이죠

translation.en: -I'll go check on those cookies. -Okay. [chuckles]
The membership numbers are down, but the money is not.
translation.ko: 회원 수는 줄었는데 돈은 안 줄었어요

translation.en: The way Madalyn gets these rich, dying atheists

translation.ko: 무신론자들이 전 재산을 그녀에게 바치게 하는 거죠

translation.en: It's a hell of a way to make a living.
translation.ko: 돈을 벌 수단은 아주 다양하단 거예요

translation.en: She's not gonna live forever.
And I don't know what she did to Bill,
but if I was him, I would have suffered through until she kicked the bucket,
translation.ko: 내가 빌이었다면, 매덜린이 죽을 때까지 고생을 감수했죠

translation.en: and then I would've taken the whole thing for myself.

translation.en: [chuckling] I mean, Garth's not gonna take over. Can you imagine?
[imitating Garth] "Hello, people, we need to start fighting for the freedom of religion."
Not funny, David.
See anybody laughing?
No more for him, huh?
Madalyn, sorry.
I don't wanna hear your excuses.
Right now, all I want out of you is breathing.
Very little of that.
Come on. I just had a little bit too much to drink.

-[Madalyn sighs] -Go ahead.

translation.en: Secrets that might interest the IRS in particular.

translation.en: Get out of here. You're ruining my holiday party.
translation.ko: 여기서 꺼져 내 파티 망치지 말고

translation.en: You really can be pathetic, you know.
You just wanna be the momma I never had, give us both a second chance.
translation.ko: 당신은 내 엄마가 되길 원했고 서로에게 두 번째 기회를 줬지

translation.ko: 우리 엄마에 대해 말해줄 게 있어

translation.en: I beat the shit out of her.
translation.ko: 난 그 여자를 개 패듯 팼고

translation.en: I beat her to a bloody pulp.
You think your son Bill hurt you?
Nah.
Not like I hurt her.
translation.ko: 내가 우리 엄마한테 한 것만큼은 아니지

translation.en: [Madalyn] Garth!
David Waters is a convicted felon.

Don't fuck with me, Madalyn. Don't fuck with me.
translation.ko: 날 열 받게 하지 마, 매덜린

translation.en: -[dogs barking] -[Robin] Are you okay?
Son of a bitch.
-[commentator] Hello, football fans... -[knock on door]
We got beer, vodka, cigs.
Finally.
[Madalyn] Hope you didn't forget about me, Danny.
No, I did not.
[Madalyn grunting] Oh, hey.
Sorry it ain't a martini.
Oh, it's the good stuff.
Yeah.
My Billy Boy...
he used to mix a mean Manhattan.
Here's to new friends.
You're all right, Danny Fry.
You know, I'm real sorry we're putting you through all this.
translation.ko: 이런 일에 휘말리게 해서 정말 죄송해요

translation.en: It's not you. It's David.
I'd watch your ass around him if I were you.
You know, I trusted him.
[chuckles] Look where it got me.
I'm, uh... heading to Florida next week
translation.ko: 전 다음 주에 플로리다로 갈 거예요

translation.en: for my daughter's fifth birthday.
I'm using my take to set up her college fund.
translation.ko: 제 몫은 딸애의 대학 자금으로 쓸 거예요

translation.en: Yeah. She's awful sweet.
And lucky to have you for a father.
Thanks.
In the end...
family is all we got.
-[Roy faintly] Hello. -[Bill sighs]
-[Roy] All right, sounds good. -[dog barking]
translation.ko: “댈러스 컨벤션 지도자의 독실한 아들” 네, 좋군요

translation.en: Jack just called.
He has the sketch of the guy who sold Garth's car.
translation.ko: 가스의 차를 판 사람의 몽타주를 가져왔어요

translation.en: Who the fuck is that?
Get out!
[on recording] This is Bob Fry. Leave a message.
[chuckling] Hey, Bob, it's, uh... it's Danny.
Um... You know, I was actually just headed back to Florida just now, but, um...
I've got a couple things I gotta tie up still here in Texas.
translation.ko: 텍사스에 처리할 일이 몇 가지 생겼거든

translation.en: So, uh...
But I'm gonna be sending you a letter.
And if you could just hang onto it for me, that would be great.
Okay, thanks. Bye.
Garth?
Yes, Mother?
I know you don't like me very much.
translation.ko: 네가 날 별로 좋아하지 않는 걸 알아

translation.en: That's not true, Mother.
Well, you call me names behind my back.
translation.ko: 내 등 뒤에선 날 다르게 부르잖아

translation.en: You mean like "fat cunt"?
You call me "fat cunt"?
Yeah.
Well, you've called me worse.
I suppose.
It doesn't mean anything, you know that.
What about you, Red?
You hate me for taking you away from your father?
You didn't take me away from him.
I was too hard on him.
I'm too hard on all of you.
You're only hard on us because you believe we can be great.
translation.ko: 우리를 몰아붙였던 건 잘할 수 있다고 믿어서였죠

translation.en: I love you two.
Everything I've ever done, I... I've done for you kids.
translation.ko: 내가 한 모든 일은 너희를 위해서였어

translation.en: Bill, too.
What do you say?
When we get out of this,
we take a drive down to Dallas and visit your father, hmm?
translation.ko: 댈러스로 가서 네 아빠를 만나보는 거야

translation.en: -Are you serious? -I am.
And if the bastard refuses to see us,
[chuckling] well, I'll just bang down the goddamn door.
translation.ko: 그 빌어먹을 문을 쾅 칠 거야

translation.en: -Now, that I'd like to see. -[laughs]
I'm gonna miss you, Red.
Don't call me that.
No.
No! No!
[newscaster] She called herself the most hated woman in America.
translation.ko: 그녀는 자신을 미국에서 가장 미움받는 여인이라 했죠

translation.en: Tonight, the incredible case of Madalyn Murray O'Hair.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤, 매덜린 머레이의 놀라운 사건을 전합니다 “미국에서 가장 미움받는 여성”

translation.en: [reporter] In 1963, Madalyn Murray O'Hair found the cause that would make her famous.
translation.ko: 1963년, 매덜린 머레이는 자신이 유명해질 일을 찾습니다

translation.en: And some say, rich.
She filed a lawsuit against the Baltimore public school board.
The case would go all the way to the Supreme Court
in a landmark ruling that banned prayer in schools.
translation.ko: 학교에서 기도를 금지하는 획기적 판결이 나옵니다

translation.en: Over the next three decades,
no one person has been thought a bigger threat to religion.
translation.ko: 종교에 그 정도의 위협을 가한 사람은 없었습니다

translation.en: In 1995, Madalyn was 77 years old, in failing health,
translation.ko: “차드 마틴 텍사스 주 오스틴” 95년, 77세가 된 매덜린은 건강이 쇠약해졌고

translation.en: and likely would've spent her remaining years in relative obscurity.
translation.ko: 여생을 조용히 보내고 싶었던 것 같습니다

translation.en: Except that, before she could die,
the nation's most famous atheist suddenly vanished.
translation.ko: 이 가장 유명한 무신론자가 갑자기 사라졌죠

translation.en: [Jack] Well, the thing that strikes you is there was no panic
translation.ko: 놀라운 사실은 머레이 오헤어가 사라졌을 때

translation.en: when the Murray O'Hairs disappeared.
There was no real effort to find them. Uh...
Yet there was over $600,000 missing, Robin's car was abandoned,
translation.ko: 60만 달러 정도가 사라졌고 로빈의 차도 버려졌으며

translation.en: and another was sold by a mysterious stranger.
translation.ko: 의문의 사람이 또 다른 차를 팔기도 했죠

translation.en: [reporter] Mark Sparrow answered the ad in the newspaper
translation.ko: 마크 스패로 씨는 신문 광고를 보고 연락했고

translation.en: and thought he'd found a steal of a deal
since the car was priced $5,000 below Blue Book value.
translation.ko: 그 차는 중고차 시세로 5천 달러였기 때문입니다 “플로리다 주 네이플스 1998년”

translation.en: But although Garth Murray's signature appears
-on the title of transfer documents... -Danny?
...Sparrow is certain that the man who sold him the car was not Garth Murray.
translation.ko: 스패로 씨는 차를 판 사람이 가스가 아니라고 합니다

translation.en: [Bob] Right before Danny disappeared, I got a call.
He told me he was sending a letter.
There weren't many details.
But he said he and a guy named Gary Karr were in on a kidnapping scheme,
translation.ko: 대니와 개리라는 남자가 데이비드 워터스란 사람이 세운

translation.en: brought in by somebody called David Waters.
David Waters?
Danny said these people they took...
were expecting to come out of it alive.
But he wasn't so sure.
And you told all this to the police?
Sure.
Yeah, but they didn't seem too keen on looking for a missing ex-con.
translation.ko: 하지만 사라진 전과자를 찾는 일에 관심 없어 보였죠

translation.en: I called Waters up looking for Danny.
He made up some excuse.
And then he threatened to kill my family.
Are you prepared to go on the record?
Yeah.
[woman] Mr. Waters, I'm not one for plea agreements,
translation.ko: “텍사스 주 샌안토니오 1998년” 유죄 협상은 싫지만 전 참견할 권리가 없네요

translation.en: but I don't really have a say in the matter.
translation.ko: 유죄 협상은 싫지만 전 참견할 권리가 없네요

translation.en: You've discussed this with your lawyer?
Go ahead.
Gary was like a mad dog.
Sooner or later he was gonna bite.
David.
Oh, Jesus Christ.
God damn it, Karr. What the fuck did you do?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 칼 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: [Danny] Jesus! David?
What are we gonna do now? -[softly] Calm down. -[Danny breathing heavily]

translation.ko: 매덜린이 못 보게 침실에 시체를 숨겨야 해

translation.en: Oh, no.
[sobbing] No! David, no!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Danny, do something!
Mother!
No!
-No! -Don't look! Don't look!
[sobbing] Oh, God!
Do it.
Here.
Do it.
Do it.
Gary, I can't.
[David] He couldn't be trusted to keep his mouth shut, so...
translation.ko: 대니가 비밀을 지킬지 믿을 수가 없어서

translation.en: I had Gary take him out, too.
[woman] What happened to the money?
We kept the gold in a storage locker.
And when we went to collect... [sighs]
...it was gone.
We'd been robbed.
Fucking five-dollar lock.
I never intended to kill her.
But I can't say that I'm sorry that she's dead.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 여자가 죽은 게 유감스럽진 않아요

translation.en: [reporter] We're live here at Camp Wood,
where confessed murderer David Waters is leading police
translation.ko: 살인했다고 자백한 장소인 캠프 우드에 와있습니다

translation.en: to the spot where he buried the bodies of Madalyn Murray O'Hair,
translation.ko: 데이비드는 그날 밤 매덜린과 그녀의 아들과 손녀의 시신을

translation.en: her son and granddaughter, on that gruesome night in 1995.
There were rumors that they had fled to New Zealand...
Well, at least she didn't go unnoticed.
...police finally narrowed in on Waters and his partner in crime, Gary Karr...
translation.ko: 경찰은 마침내 용의자를 워터스와 개리로 압축하고...

translation.en: She would've appreciated that.
...also charged with the murder of a third kidnapper.
translation.ko: 세 번째 유괴범을 살인한 죄로 기소했습니다

translation.en: Please, no prayers. She wouldn't have wanted that.
Does it worry you that, uh, when you die, that there's not going to be nirvana

translation.en: or whatever you care to call it?
[laughs] When I die, I don't want some religious nut

translation.ko: 영성체를 입안에 넣거나 하는 멍청한 종교적 의식은 싫어요

translation.en: But I wouldn't mind a small corner of the outdoors

translation.ko: 내 얼굴에 부드럽게 비치는 작은 야외 공간이면 만족해요

translation.en: Three words on my tombstone.
translation.ko: 내 묘비엔 세 단어를 쓸 거예요

translation.en: "Woman." I've loved being a woman.
"Grandmother." I've loved being a grandmother.
And "mother." I have loved being a mother.
That's what I'd like to be remembered for most.
That's what I'd like it to say on my tombstone, but...
being who I am, I'm not expecting I'll be having a goddamn tombstone. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 절 싫어하는 사람이 많으니 묘비 같은 건 기대도 안 해요
